articles.title: Trump to Meet Putin in Alaska Summit
articles.description: President Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin are scheduled to meet in Anchorage, Alaska, to discuss a ceasefire in Ukraine and potential follow-up diplomacy involving Ukrainian President Zelenskyy. Trump has warned that Putin will face 'very severe consequences' if no peace deal is reached.

articles.title: Trump Seeks to Extend Federal Control over DC Police
articles.description: President Trump is preparing legislation to prolong federal oversight of Washington, D.C.'s Metropolitan Police Department beyond the 30-day limit. He has already mobilized National Guard troops and federal agents in the city to combat violent crime, though data shows D.C. crime is currently at a 30-year low.
